Despian Quaeritis._current:
1 "Despia" monster + 1 LIGHT or DARK monster
① MAIN PHASE | HOPT | QUICK | You can change the ATK of all monsters currently on the field to 0 until the end of this turn, except Level 8 or higher Fusion Monsters.
② HOPT | If this face-up card in its owner's control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can add to your hand, or Special Summon, 1 "Fallen of Albaz" or 1 "Despia" monster, from your Deck.

Predaplant Darlingtonia Cobra._current:
If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "Predaplant" monster: You can SEARCH 1 "Polymerization" Spell Card or "Fusion" Spell Card.
You can only use this effect of "Predaplant Darlingtonia Cobra" once per Duel.

Red Wyvern._current:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
① During either player's turn, if a monster with higher ATK than this Synchro Summoned card is on the field: You can DESTROY the 1 face-up monster on the field that has the highest ATK (your choice, if tied). This effect can only be used once while this card is face-up on the field.

① HOPT | If a "Sky Striker Ace" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, except "Sky Striker Ace - Roze" (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand.
